sentences.en: Issuance, claims and reinsurance cession functionalities.
sentences.cn: 保险 、 索款及再保险割让功能.

sentences.en: Spanish cession of the territory in 1818
The cession of the territory avoided because they lost the war.
sentences.cn: 领土的割让是不可避免的因为他们输掉了那场战争.

sentences.en: The cession of the territory could not be avoided because they lost the war.
sentences.cn: 因为他们输了这场战争,割让领土是无法避免的.

sentences.en: The Convention of Peking in 1860 , which ended the hostilities, provided for its outright cession.
sentences.cn: 一八六零年, 战争结束, 订立《北京条约》,九龙半岛正式割让予英国.

sentences.en: Third - party states have no title to object to cession.

trans.tran_en: the act of giving up land, property, or rights, especially to another country after a war, or something that is given up in this way
